function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of control over data collected by private entities","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of universal standards for data management","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between ppps and the actual needs of the cities may lead to ineffective implementation of smart city and safe city projects.","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy, control, and propaganda issues arising from the implementation of smart and safe city concepts.","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Surveillance and monitoring by corporations and governance entities","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global cooperation and governance challenges in the face of corporate influence","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of wireless technology installation and application due to covid-19","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of recognition and consideration of pandemics in urban planning and architectural professional institutions.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Segregation of information in the urban realm within independent private corporations and government bodies.","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of public management in pandemic control","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict public management and restricted daily life","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scattered outbreaks due to imported cases and goods","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to screen suspected infectors due to large-scale and fast-moving population","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale population movement causing infection","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Centrality of welfare and housing policies in population well-being","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate management of individual behaviors to comply with safety requirements","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation to emerging problems and urgent demands","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient policies and infrastructure for addressing airborne infections","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of airborne infection control policies in hospital architecture design","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contradictory evidence on the relationship between human density and infection severity may lead to misinterpretation and mismanagement of pandemic control measures","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Critical factors such as population density and travel history contributing to the spread of covid-19","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The characteristics of urban design and transportation can affect pandemic dynamics, with contradictory evidence on the relationship between density and infection outbreaks.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The rate of people coming from highly populated areas and the density of population areas are critical factors in understanding the spread rates of covid-19, with contradictory evidence on the relationship between
